text: Yadi muminadera du'i dala yud'dhe lipta haye pare, tabe tomara tadera madhye mimansa kare dibe. Atahpara yadi tadera ekadala apara dalera upara cara'o haya, tabe tomara akramanakari dalera birud'dhe yud'dha karabe; ye paryanta na tara allahara nirdesera dike phire ase. Yadi phire ase, tabe tomara tadera madhye n'yayanuga panthaya mimansa kare dibe ebam inachapha karabe. Niscaya allaha inachaphakariderake pachanda karena.
